description: Who Is Apocalypse?En Sabah Nur, “The Seven Lights”, is an ancient mutant and an easy number 2 on the “X-Men Big Bad rating chart”. Blessed with incredible regenerative abilities, nigh immortal, and gifted alien “Celestial” technology. Apocalypse is a classical Darwinist, and often empowers other mutants to do his bidding, turning them into “Horseman of […]
title: Marvel Crisis Protocol – Apocalypse Review

description: Take a look at the new boards included in the Emberwatch box and go just a little deeper. Included are clean images if you want to grab a marker and scribble all over them like John Madden on a telestrator.

description: Alex & Dan return for our final set of hot takes on the brand new 3rd edition of Bolt Action.
